posts.description: Come schedule an appointment at the RPI counseling center! Open Monday through Friday from 8am to 5pm (except 12pm to 1pm for a short lunch break). You can call (518)-276-6479 or come visit in Academy Hall 3000 Level, Suite 3200.
RPA is devoted to promoting understanding, appreciation and pride in LGBT history and culture on the RPI's campus.
A club for all autistic students on campus to socialize and advocate.

posts.resource: The Steve Fund Crisis Text Line
posts.description: 24/7 crisis text line for youth of color (text STEVE to 741741)
